column3: ACK e91f0a7af2aec7d924f00da25c69d8f46e0dd33d\nI have reviewed docs and comments changes and they look OK, I agree they can be merged.

if you wanted to keep the badge in the readme, you could alternatively fix the img link as part of the branch/release process, since
```
https://api.travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin.svg?branch=0.18
```
and
```
https://api.travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin.svg?tag=v0.18.0
```
seem to work as expected
Post-merge ACK\n\nI understand it's only docs, but 4 hours between opening and merging (author and merger being the same person) sets a bad precedent, IMO.
